description: This file provides a wrapper around the fetch API to interact with a Task Management backend. It includes utility functions for constructing URLs, making API requests, and parsing responses, tailored for the frontend client communicating with the backend server.

methods.name: readApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Determines the API base URL based on environment variables or defaults to localhost:3001.

methods.name: buildUrl(path, params)
methods.description: Constructs a URL with query parameters for API calls.

methods.name: parseJsonSafe(res)
methods.description: Safely parses the JSON response or returns text if parsing fails.

methods.name: apiFetch(path, { method = "GET", params, body, headers } = {})
methods.description: Performs a fetch request to the API, handles errors, and parses JSON responses.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the configured API base URL for debugging purposes.

ctags.name: apiFetch
ctags.pattern: /^export async function apiFetch(path, { method = "GET", params, body, headers } = {}) {$/
